data.chText: 问题
data.enText: question

data.chText: 问；询问
data.enText: to say or write sth in the form of a question, in order to get information

data.chText: “你去哪里？”她问道。
data.enText: ‘Where are you going?’ she asked.

data.chText: “你有把握吗？”他问她。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+直接引语

data.enText: ‘Are you sure?’ he asked her.

data.chText: 他询问了她的家庭情况。
data.enText: He asked about her family.

data.chText: 要是你不介意我提问——你多大年纪了？
data.enText: How old are you─if you don't mind me/my asking ?

data.chText: 采访者问了我的未来计划。
data.enText: The interviewer asked me about my future plans.

data.chText: 我能提个问题吗？
data.enText: Can I ask a question ?

data.chText: 你问了价钱没有？
data.enText: Did you ask the price?

data.chText: 她问了学生们的姓名。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+名词短语

data.enText: She asked the students their names.

data.chText: 我常常被问到那件事！
data.enText: I often get asked that!

data.chText: 他问我住在哪里。
data.enText: He asked where I lived.

data.chText: 我不得不问老师下一步做什么。
data.enText: I had to ask the teacher what to do next.

data.chText: 有人问我会不会开车。
data.enText: I was asked if/whether I could drive.
I asked to my friend what had happened.

data.text: 不能说ask to sb。不作I asked to my friend what had happened.

data.chText: 请求
data.enText: request

data.chText: 要求；请求
data.enText: to tell sb that you would like them to do sth or that you would like sth to happen

data.chText: 全体学生都被要求填一份调查表。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+带to的不定式

data.enText: All the students were asked to complete a questionnaire.

data.chText: 埃里克求我嫁给他。
data.enText: Eric asked me to marry him.

data.chText: 我问他们是否可以给我换票。
data.enText: I asked whether they could change my ticket.

data.chText: 她问我愿不愿意给她上英语课。
data.enText: She asked me if I would give her English lessons.

data.chText: 她要求继续向她报告事态发展情况。
data.enText: She asked that she be kept informed of developments.

data.chText: 她要求继续向她报告有关情况。
data.enText: She asked that she should be kept informed.

data.chText: 请求，恳求（给予）；征求
data.enText: to say that you would like sb to give you sth

data.chText: 求职；要一杯饮料；要求解释
data.enText: to ask for a job/a drink/an explanation

data.chText: 我写信是想了解关于课程的情况。
data.enText: I am writing to ask for some information about courses.

data.chText: 你为什么不征询他的意见？
data.enText: Why don't you ask his advice?

data.chText: 能请你帮个忙吗？
data.enText: Can I ask a favour of you?

data.chText: 你为什么不征求他的意见？

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+名词短语

data.enText: Why don't you ask him for his advice?

data.chText: 我能请你帮个忙吗？
data.enText: Can I ask you a favour?

data.chText: 准许
data.enText: permission

data.chText: 请求允许；要求准许
data.enText: to request permission to do sth

data.chText: 你是提出想用这辆车吗？
data.enText: Did you ask to use the car?

data.chText: 我要求见经理。
data.enText: I asked to see the manager.

data.chText: 我会问是否可以在这里停车。
data.enText: I'll ask if it's all right to park here.

data.chText: 她问老板可不可以让她请一天假。
data.enText: She asked her boss whether she could have the day off.

data.chText: 邀请
data.enText: invite

data.chText: 请；邀请
data.enText: to invite sb

data.chText: 他们已邀请我吃饭。
data.enText: They've asked me to dinner.

data.chText: 我没有请他们进屋。
data.enText: I didn't ask them in (= to come into the house) .

data.chText: 我们得请邻居到家里来。
data.enText: We must ask the neighbours round (= to our house) .

data.chText: 她已邀请他来参加聚会。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+带to的不定式

data.enText: She's asked him to come to the party.

data.chText: 钱
data.enText: money

data.chText: 要价；索价
data.enText: to request a particular amount of money for sth that you are selling

data.chText: 这辆轿车他要价2 000英镑。
data.enText: He's asking £2 000 for the car.

data.chText: 期望；要求
data.enText: expect/demand

data.chText: 期望；要求
data.enText: to expect or demand sth

data.chText: 我知道我的要求很高。
data.enText: I know I'm asking a great deal.

data.chText: 你对他要求过分了。
data.enText: You're asking too much of him.

data.chText: 我知道期望他们再次获胜未免要求太高了。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+带to的不定式

data.enText: I know it's asking a lot to expect them to win again.
ask for it

data.chText: 罪有应得；自讨苦吃；自找麻烦
data.enText: to deserve sth bad that happens to you or that sb does to you
be asking for trouble
be asking for it

data.chText: 要自找麻烦；要自讨苦吃
data.enText: to behave in a way that is very likely to result in trouble
don't ask

data.chText: 不问为好；还是别问的好
data.enText: if you say don't ask to sb, you mean that you do not want to reply to their question, because it would be awkward, embarrassing, etc.
don't ask me

data.chText: （不知答案并表示愤怒时说）别问我
data.enText: if you say don't ask me , you mean that you do not know the answer to a question and are annoyed you have been asked
for the asking

data.chText: 只需要求，一经索取（便可获得）
data.enText: if you can have sth for the asking , it is very easy for you to get it if you ask for it

data.chText: 只要开口，这份工作就是你的了。
data.enText: The job is yours for the asking.
I ask you

data.chText: （表示不赞成、震惊或气愤）请问，真是，这还了得
data.enText: if you say I ask you , you are expressing disapproval, shock or anger about sth/sb
if you ask me

data.chText: 我认为；依我说
data.enText: in my personal opinion

data.chText: 依我看，他们的婚姻是个错误。
data.enText: Their marriage was a mistake, if you ask me.
ask after sb

data.chText: 问候；问好
data.enText: to say that you would like to know how sb is, what they are doing, etc.

data.chText: 他在信中总要问候你。
data.enText: He always asks after you in his letters.
ask around

data.chText: 四处打听；多方询问
data.enText: to speak to a number of different people in order to try and get some information

data.chText: 我不知道公司有没有空缺，不过我会打听打听。
data.enText: I don't know of any vacancies in the company but I'll ask around.
ask sb back

data.chText: 邀请（一起外出的人）回到家里来
data.enText: to invite sb to come back to your house when you are both out together

data.chText: 我本不希望他会邀请我回到他家去。
data.enText: I hoped he wouldn't ask me back.
ask for sb/sth

data.chText: 说要找（某人）；问到（某处）的路
data.enText: to say that you want to speak to sb or be directed to a place

data.chText: 你到达后找简。
data.enText: When you arrive, ask for Jane.
ask sb out

data.chText: 请…外出约会（尤指男女交往约会之始）
data.enText: to invite sb to go out with you, especially as a way of starting a romantic relationship

data.chText: 他太腼腆，不好意思约她外出。
data.enText: He's too shy to ask her out.
a big ask

data.chText: 难以做到的事情；棘手的事
data.enText: a difficult thing to achieve or deal with

data.chText: 这个队要打败世界冠军当然难度很大。
data.enText: Beating the world champions is certainly a big ask for the team.

data.chText: 以上各词均含口头或书面询问之义。
data.enText: All these words mean to say or write sth in the form of a question, in order to get information.
ask

data.chText: 指口头或书面提问、询问：
data.enText: to say or write sth in the form of a question, in order to get information

data.chText: “你去哪？”她问道。
data.enText: ‘Where are you going?’ she asked.

data.chText: 她问了学生的姓名。
data.enText: She asked the students their names.

data.chText: 我能提个问题吗？
data.enText: Can I ask a question ?
enquire/inquire

data.chText: 指询问、查询：
data.enText: ( rather formal ) to ask sb for information

data.chText: 我打电话到车站询问了火车时刻。
data.enText: I called the station to enquire about train times.
demand

data.chText: 指严正地问、质问：
data.enText: to ask a question very firmly

data.chText: “那你去了哪里？”他怒气冲冲地质问道。
data.enText: ‘And where have you been?’ he demanded angrily.
query

data.chText: 指提问：
data.enText: ( formal ) to ask a question

data.chText: “为什么不呢？”她问道。
data.enText: ‘Why ever not?’ she queried.
to ask/enquire about/after sb/sth
to ask/enquire/demand sth of sb
to ask/enquire/demand/query what/who/how , etc.
to ask/enquire/query politely
to ask/enquire/demand angrily

data.chText: 以上各词均含要求之义。
data.enText: These words all mean to say that sb should do or have sth.
demand

data.chText: 指强烈要求、坚决要求：
data.enText: to ask for sth very firmly; to say very firmly that sb should have or do sth

data.chText: 她要求立即作出解释。
data.enText: She demanded an immediate explanation.
require

data.chText: 指要求做（某事）、达到（某水平），尤指根据法规或规定：
data.enText: [often passive] ( rather formal ) to make sb do or have sth, especially because it is necessary according to a law or set of rules or standards

data.chText: 所有候选者都要参加一个小测验。
data.enText: All candidates will be required to take a short test.
expect

data.chText: 指要求、认为应得、指望，尤因义务或责任：
data.enText: to demand that sb should do, have or be sth, especially because it is their duty or responsibility

data.chText: 我要求即时付工钱。
data.enText: I expect to be paid promptly for the work.
insist

data.chText: 指坚决要求、坚持：
data.enText: to demand that sth happens or that sb agrees to do sth

data.chText: 我并不想去，但他硬要我去。
data.enText: I didn't want to go but he insisted.

data.chText: 我们始终坚持最高标准。
data.enText: We insist on the highest standards at all times.
ask

data.chText: 指期望、要求：
data.enText: to expect or demand sth

data.chText: 你对他要求过分了。
data.enText: You're asking too much of him.

data.chText: 用demand、expect还是ask？
ask不如demand和expect语气强烈，demand和expect更像命令。
data.enText: Ask is not as strong as demand or expect , both of which can be more like a command.
demand, expect or ask?
to demand/require/expect/ask sth of/from sb
to ask for sth
to demand/require/expect/insist/ask that…
to require/expect/ask sb to do sth
to demand/require/expect/ask a lot/too much/a great deal
to be too much to expect/ask

ex.chText: 你最好问一下去飞机场怎么走。
ex.enText: You'd better ask someone the way to the airport.

ex.chText: 我可以问你一个问题吗？
ex.enText: May I ask you a question?

synonyms.bx: 最普通用词，指提出问题让人回答，多用于口语中。

ex.chText: 我们打听去车站的路。
ex.enText: We inquired about the way to the station.

ex.chText: 警察去问了隔壁那家。
ex.enText: The police inquired at the next door.

ex.chText: 她询问国家图书馆何时开门。
ex.enText: She inquired when the national library would open.

synonyms.bx: 较正式用词，指为了解真实情况而详细询问。

ex.chText: 他询问她是否参加聚会。
ex.enText: He queried/asked if she would come to the party.

ex.chText: “你们什么时候出发？”汤姆问道。
ex.enText: 'What time are you leaving?' Tom queried/asked.

ex.chText: 她就经济情况向总统提问。
ex.enText: She queried/asked the president about the economic situation.

synonyms.bx: 作此义解时，可与 ask 换用。

ex.chText: 她问了经理很多问题。
ex.enText: She questioned the manager closely.

ex.chText: 凶手被审问了3个小时。
ex.enText: The murderer was questioned for 3 hours.

synonyms.bx: 指因感到可疑或为了解情况、弄清究竟而正式地发问，尤指就某一罪案进行盘问。

ex.chText: 他申请了那份工作。
ex.enText: He applied for the job.

ex.chText: 她只向一所大学提出申请并被录取了。
ex.enText: She only applied to one university and was accepted.

synonyms.bx: 通常指通过提交书面材料来进行正式申请，常后接介词 for/to。

ex.chText: 要一杯饮料/要求解释/求职
ex.enText: ask for a drink/an explanation/a job

ex.chText: 你可以请他帮个忙。
ex.enText: You can ask him for a favour.

synonyms.bx: 指说出让某人给予某物或做某事的想法，常后接介词 for。

ex.chText: 她起诉要求离婚。
ex.enText: She sued for divorce.

ex.chText: 他们被迫求和。
ex.enText: They were forced to sue for peace.

synonyms.bx: 尤指在法庭上提出请求。

ex.chText: 工人们要求9点50分到10点10分之间为休息时间。
ex.enText: The workers demanded a break between 9:50 and 10:10.

ex.chText: 他要求董事会给出一个明确答复。
ex.enText: He demanded a clear answer from the board.

ex.chText: 她要求知道谁负责这次行动。
ex.enText: She demanded to know who was in charge of this action.

synonyms.bx: 指强烈要求某事物，尤用于认为自己有权这么做时。

ex.chText: 你要求过分了！
ex.enText: You are asking too much!

ex.chText: 他太忙了，不得不请求帮助。
ex.enText: He was so busy that he had to ask for help.

ex.chText: 主席要求给出解释。
ex.enText: The chairman asked for an explanation.

synonyms.bx: 指要求某人提供帮助、建议、信息等。

ex.chText: 那些申请政治避难者大多数都是难民。
ex.enText: Most of those who claimed asylum were refugees.

ex.chText: 银行要求苏珊付款。
ex.enText: The bank claimed payment from Susan.

ex.chText: 他们就这次损失向那家快递公司提出赔偿要求。
ex.enText: They claimed losses from the express company.

synonyms.bx: 指因有权得到某事物而公开提出要求。

ex.chText: 军官要求警察都穿警服。
ex.enText: The officer expected the policemen to wear police uniforms.

ex.chText: 这对年轻的夫妇对他们的孩子期望很高。
ex.enText: This young couple expects a lot of their child.

synonyms.bx: 指出于责任或常理而要求某人做某事，含期待之意。

ex.zh: 询问怎样/什么东西/什么时间/什么地点/谁/为什么

data.enText: ask for it

data.chText: 罪有应得；自讨苦吃；自找麻烦
data.enText: to deserve sth bad that happens to you or that sb does to you
be asking for trouble
be asking for it

data.chText: 要自找麻烦；要自讨苦吃
data.enText: to behave in a way that is very likely to result in trouble
don't ask

data.chText: 不问为好；还是别问的好
data.enText: if you say don't ask to sb, you mean that you do not want to reply to their question, because it would be awkward, embarrassing, etc.
don't ask me

data.chText: （不知答案并表示愤怒时说）别问我
data.enText: if you say don't ask me , you mean that you do not know the answer to a question and are annoyed you have been asked
for the asking

data.chText: 只需要求，一经索取（便可获得）
data.enText: if you can have sth for the asking , it is very easy for you to get it if you ask for it

data.chText: 只要开口，这份工作就是你的了。
data.enText: The job is yours for the asking.
I ask you

data.chText: （表示不赞成、震惊或气愤）请问，真是，这还了得
data.enText: if you say I ask you , you are expressing disapproval, shock or anger about sth/sb
if you ask me

data.chText: 我认为；依我说
data.enText: in my personal opinion

data.chText: 依我看，他们的婚姻是个错误。
data.enText: Their marriage was a mistake, if you ask me.
a big ask

data.chText: 难以做到的事情；棘手的事
data.enText: a difficult thing to achieve or deal with

data.chText: 这个队要打败世界冠军当然难度很大。
data.enText: Beating the world champions is certainly a big ask for the team.
ask after sb

data.chText: 问候；问好
data.enText: to say that you would like to know how sb is, what they are doing, etc.

data.chText: 他在信中总要问候你。
data.enText: He always asks after you in his letters.
ask around

data.chText: 四处打听；多方询问
data.enText: to speak to a number of different people in order to try and get some information

data.chText: 我不知道公司有没有空缺，不过我会打听打听。
data.enText: I don't know of any vacancies in the company but I'll ask around.
ask sb back

data.chText: 邀请（一起外出的人）回到家里来
data.enText: to invite sb to come back to your house when you are both out together

data.chText: 我本不希望他会邀请我回到他家去。
data.enText: I hoped he wouldn't ask me back.
ask for sb/sth

data.chText: 说要找（某人）；问到（某处）的路
data.enText: to say that you want to speak to sb or be directed to a place

data.chText: 你到达后找简。
data.enText: When you arrive, ask for Jane.
ask sb out

data.chText: 请…外出约会（尤指男女交往约会之始）
data.enText: to invite sb to go out with you, especially as a way of starting a romantic relationship

data.chText: 他太腼腆，不好意思约她外出。
data.enText: He's too shy to ask her out.

tr: make a request or demand for something to somebody
example: She asked him for a loan
We require our secretary to be on time
Aren't we asking too much of these children?
I expect my students to arrive in time for their lessons
I asked about their special today
He had to ask directions several times

tr: address a question to and expect an answer from
example: The children asked me about their dead grandmother

tr: require or ask for as a price or condition
example: He is asking $200 for the table
The kidnappers are asking a million dollars in return for the release of their hostage

tr: require as useful, just, or proper
example: It takes nerve to do what she did
This job asks a lot of patience and skill
This position demands a lot of personal sacrifice
This dinner calls for a spectacular dessert
This intervention does not postulate a patient's consent

value.def: If you ask someone something, you say something to them in the form of a question because you want to know the answer.

example.ex: 'How is Frank?' he asked...
example.tran: “弗兰克怎么样了？”他问道。

example.ex: I asked him his name...
example.tran: 我询问了他的名字。

example.ex: I wasn't the only one asking questions...
example.tran: 不只是我一个人提出了问题。

example.ex: She asked me if  I'd enjoyed my dinner...
example.tran: 她问我晚餐是否吃得满意。

example.ex: If Daniel asks what happened in court we will tell him...
example.tran: 如果丹尼尔问起庭审情况，我们会告诉他。

example.ex: You will have to ask David about that...
example.tran: 那件事你得问戴维。

example.ex: 'I'm afraid to ask what it cost.' — 'Then don't ask.'
example.tran: “我不敢问这个东西花了多少钱。”——“那就别问了。”

value.def: If you ask someone to do something, you tell them that you want them to do it.

example.ex: We had to ask him to leave...
example.tran: 我们不得不要求他离开。

example.ex: She said she had been asked to take two suitcases to Africa by a man called Sean.
example.tran: 她说有个名叫肖恩的男人要她带两个手提箱去非洲。

value.def: If you ask to do something, you tell someone that you want to do it.

example.ex: I asked to see the Director.
example.tran: 我要求见主任。

value.def: If you ask for something, you say that you would like it.

example.ex: I decided to go to the next house and ask for food...
example.tran: 我决定去隔壁那家要点吃的。

example.ex: Who asked for your opinion?
example.tran: 谁问你的意见了？

value.def: If you ask for someone, you say that you would like to speak to them.

example.ex: There's a man at the gate asking for you.
example.tran: 门口有个人想见你。

value.def: If you ask someone's permission, opinion, or forgiveness, you try to obtain it by putting a request to them.

example.ex: Please ask permission from whoever pays the phone bill before making your call.
example.tran: 打电话前请先征得话费支付方的同意。

value.tran: 请求，征求（许可、意见、谅解）

value.def: If you ask someone to an event or place, you invite them to go there.

example.ex: Couldn't you ask Jon to the party?...
example.tran: 你不能邀请乔恩参加聚会吗？

example.ex: She asked me back to her house.
example.tran: 她又邀请我去了她家。

value.def: If someone is asking a particular price for something, they are selling it for that price.

example.ex: Mr Pantelaras was asking £6,000 for his collection.
example.tran: 潘特莱拉斯先生为他的藏品要价6,000英镑。

value.def: You reply 'don't ask me' when you do not know the answer to a question, usually when you are annoyed or surprised that you have been asked.

example.ex: 'She's got other things on her mind, wouldn't you think?' 'Don't ask me,' murmured Chris. 'I've never met her.'
example.tran: “她还有别的心事，你不觉得吗？”“别问我，”克里斯嘀咕道，“我从未见过她。”

value.tran: （通常用于表示对询问感到恼怒或惊讶）不要问我

value.def: If something is yours for the asking, you could get it very easily if you wanted to.

example.ex: He knew the nomination was his for the asking.
example.tran: 他知道只要他开口就能得到那项提名。

value.tran: 只要开口（便可得到）；唾手可得

value.def: If you say 'I ask you', you are emphasizing how much you disapprove of someone or something.

example.ex: That silly old bat. I ask you, who'd she think she was?
example.tran: 那个老蠢货。我倒要问一问，她以为她是谁呀？

value.tran: （强调反对）请问，真是，这还了得

value.def: You can say 'may I ask' as a formal way of asking a question, which shows you are annoyed or suspicious about something.

example.ex: May I ask where you're going, sir?
example.tran: 先生，请问您要去哪？

value.tran: （一种正式的询问方式，表示感到困扰或心生疑虑）请问

value.def: You can say 'if you ask me' to emphasize that you are stating your personal opinion.

example.ex: He was nuts, if you ask me.
example.tran: 要我说的话，他是个疯子。

value.def: If you say that someone is asking for trouble or is asking for it, you mean that they are behaving in a way that makes it very likely that they will get into trouble.

example.ex: To go ahead with the match after such clear advice had been asking for trouble.
example.tran: 都劝说得这么明白了还要继续比赛，这简直就是自讨苦吃。
